Module com.alike
Package com.alike.graphsystem

Class Node

java.lang.Object
com.alike.graphsystem.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparator<Node>
public class Node extends Object implements Comparator<Node>
Used to represent nodes (cities) in the TSP.

    • isVisited

      public boolean isVisited()
      Used to check whether the Node has been visited by an algorithm in this run.
      Returns:
      true: if the node has been visited, false: if the node has not been visited (by a solver)

    • getClosestNode

      public Node getClosestNode(ArrayList<Node> otherNodes, boolean unvisited) throws NoClosestNodeException
      Finds the closest node to this node in the input array of nodes.
      Parameters:
      otherNodes - The input array of node from which we will find a closest node.
      unvisited - Whether the node found should be unvisited or not.
      Returns:
      closestFoundNode The closest found node to this node.
      Throws:
      NoClosestNodeException - Thrown if a closest node could not be found.

    • decrementNumNodes

      public static void decrementNumNodes()
      Used to decrease the @code{numNodes} attribute by one NB: This method is very unsafe and will cause havoc if not used properly!
